body_html: If you have Python code for connecting to the stream and parsing the JSON into arrays, you could wrap that logic in a Python generator and use Dataset.from_generator() (currently only available in the nightly build).
body_text: If you have Python code for connecting to the stream and parsing the JSON into arrays, you could wrap that logic in a Python generator and use Dataset.from_generator() (currently only available in the nightly build).
body: If you have Python code for connecting to the stream and parsing the JSON into arrays, you could wrap that logic in a Python generator and use `Dataset.from_generator()` (currently only available in the nightly build).
